Model¶

Network structure documentation

High level model¶

class neuron_visualization_addon.model.Network.Network(id)[source]¶

Bases: object

Network class. Network consists of populations and projections between them.

animateSpikes(spikes)[source]¶

Animate network.

Parameters:spikes (dict) – Dictionary of cell IDs as keys and a tuple of time and intensity as values
highlightPopulation(population_id)[source]¶

Highlights a population with a random color.

Parameters:population_id (string) – The population ID.
highlightPopulationsAll()[source]¶

Highlights all populations with random colors.

pullProjections(populationID_1, populationID_2)[source]¶

Pull projections between two populations.

Parameters:
  • populationID_1 (string) – First population ID
  • populationID_2 (string) – Second population ID
pullProjectionsAll()[source]¶

Pulls all projections to the center of their mass.

removeHighlightAll()[source]¶

Removes highlight from all populations.

class neuron_visualization_addon.model.Population.Population(id, size, cell_type)[source]¶

Bases: object

This class represents a population of brain cells in the network

cellSpike(id)[source]¶

Set a specific cell to spike.

Parameters:id (string) – Cell ID
location¶

Location of the center of mass.

pullTogether()[source]¶

Pull cells towards the center of mass.

removeColor()[source]¶

Remove coloring from the population.

setColor(color=(0.0, 0.0, 0.0))[source]¶

Set coloring of the whole population

Parameters:color (tuple) – RGB color
class neuron_visualization_addon.model.Cell.Cell(id, location=(0, 0, 0))[source]¶

Bases: object

This class represents a brain cell in the network

drawAxon(weight, destinationCell)[source]¶

Draw an axon between this cell and destination cell.

Parameters:
  • weight (float) – The weight of a connection.
  • destinationCell (Cell) – Projection destionation cell.
Returns:

Projection – Created projection
isProjectedTo(projection)[source]¶

Add projections from which the input is received.

Parameters:projection (Projection) – Projection to be added
location¶

Location of the cell.

Parameters:color (tuple) – RGB color
